text: The Super is a 1991 American comedy movie directed by Rod Daniel and starring Joe Pesci, Vincent Gardenia, Ruben Blades, Madolyn Smith, Stacey Travis, Carole Shelley, Kenny Blank. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was a box office failure. ==Other websites== * * Category:1991 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Rod Daniel Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies about landlords
title: The Super
